fields.summary: Fix magefile to work with Go v1.16

comments.body:
We can just rename the {{.mage}} subdirectory to {{mage}} and update Makefile accordingly everywhere. I’ve tried to use different prefix so that it’s still kind of separated from other code, but {{-mage}} didn’t work well in Makefile (would have to be escaped = ugly), {{_mage}} looked odd and {{~mage}} looked odd too and broke {{go}} language server in VSCode (it shouldn’t have, but bah).

In the end, I didn’t like just the {{mage}} directory name, so using {{magebuild}}.
